topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5481eed36368721616790000#post_5481eed36368721616790000
Basically, Seiya kanie and Isuzu Sento visit an Amusement park called Amagi brilliant park, Which is going through some difficulties and is on the verge of closing. It turns out that the park is actually staffed by refuges from a magical land called Maple land, And the park is a facility for harvesting magical energy from the visitors while They're having fun, The Park is the only way they can maintain their existence in the human world. To save the park from closing, Seiya is hired as a manager to use his skills in entertainment. However, They have to get 250,000 Visitors in three months in order to not lose the land to real estate.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184
